name: STAPLeIT
description:
CHECK. SHRED. OR.. STAPLeIT.

We have only 15sec for stapling printed papers.

The more we staple the bundle of right papers, the more times are added.

On the contrary, If we staple bundle with any error paper, we lose small time.

Have Fun and Have a nice day.

[INPUT]

ARROW ←↓→ 

TOUCH
